message.content:
cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE

This paper presents a framework for verifying hybrid control systems in the context of automotive systems. The paper focuses on the use of data-driven techniques for learning sensitivity of continuous trajectories and reasoning techniques based on simulation relations and sequential composition. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.SY (Systems and Control), followed by cs.RO (Robotics), as the paper deals with control systems and autonomous features. The paper also uses machine learning techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses verification techniques, which could fall under cs.LG (Learning) or cs.SE (Software Engineering).
